title: Give yourself and your device some love with Microsoft Office 2019, now under $30
content:
Macworld

When we talk about love, there’s nothing we love more than reliability. And in the world of computing, few apps are more faithful stalwarts for all manner of projects than those included in Microsoft Office.

Now, you’ve got an opportunity to secure a lifetime license for all of Microsoft Office’s incredible productivity apps at a discount. Through February 4, Microsoft Office 2019 for Mac or Windows is only $29.97 (reg. $229). And while this isn’t the latest rendition of Microsoft Office, you may find that a slightly older version is more suitable for refurbished or older devices.

You’ll love that these 2019 MS Office licenses are for life, and you can say goodbye to the pesky subscription fees you’d normally pay with Microsoft 365. Both the Mac and Windows versions include the following:

  • Word 2019
  • Excel 2019
  • PowerPoint 2019
  • Outlook 2019
  • OneNote 2019

Create easy-to-read work documents, spreadsheets, and much more. However, it’s important to note that there are differences between these licenses. Windows users will also get Publisher 2019 and Access 2019 with their purchase, while Mac users will gain Teams Classic 2019.

This Valentine’s Day, treat yourself or a loved one to enhanced productivity by grabbing Microsoft Office Home and Business 2019 for Mac or Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2019 for Windows for just $29.97. No coupon is required, but this offer ends February 4 at 11:59 p.m. PT.
